title: Zur Pfaffschenke
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, Italian, Beer/Wine, Take-out, European, German, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Low-key local restaurant that has a separate menu of veganized German and international dishes. Choices include a 3-course menu or a la carte of starters, pizza, and mains like panzerotti, risotto, a goulash-style meal, and dessert. Its often hosts veg/animal rights society dinners.
